ArgonTest.Name: Print class parameter instance method base trait
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
trait MyTrait1(str: String) <: Object
public proc _.printMessage(): () = puts str
end
class MyClass2(str: String) <: MyTrait1(str) public new() end end
proc main(): () do MyClass2('Hello World').new().printMessage() end
